name: git-board-flow
description: Automates branch management, GitHub project linking, and issue/PR tracking with Git-Flow methodology.

scripts.build-macos: tsc && ncc build src/actions/github_action.ts -o dist/macos/ && ncc build src/cli.ts -o bin/macos
scripts.build-linux: tsc && ncc build src/actions/github_action.ts -o dist/linux/ && ncc build src/cli.ts -o bin/linux
scripts.build-common: ncc build runner/github_action.ts -o dist && ncc build runner/cli.ts -o bin && chmod +x bin/index.js

author: Landa Messenger
